name: Vortex Defender
description:
Very Much In Development

Vortex Defender is an up to 4 player local cooperative game. Where you must shoot your way through the various creeps coming from the void.

Featuring ...

  • Geometric Shapes
  • Sparse Audio
  • 4 Players Local Cooperative
  • No Save System
  • Certain Death
  • Possible Missing DLL Crash
